1.instruction:
Given the following translation key, translate the sentences below.
  • Cx : x is a city
  • Ixy: x is in y
  • Sx: x is a state.
  • Tx: x is a town
  • Ux: x is a university.
  • d: Durham
  • n: North Carolina
questions: Not everything in North Carolina is a Town
Anything that is in North Carolina is not a Town.
Anything that is not in North Carolina is a town.
Everything is in North Carolina and is not a town.
Some universities are not in Durham.
Being in Durham is a necessary condition for being a university.
Being in Durham is a sufficient and necessary condition for being in North Carolina.
Everything is such that it can be in North Carolina only if it is in Durham.

2.instruction:
Given the following translation key, translate the sentences below.
  • Cx : x is a city
  • Ixy: x is in y
  • Sx: x is a state.
  • Tx: x is a town
  • Ux: x is a university.
  • d: Durham
  • n: North Carolina
questions: Anything that is in Durham is in North Carolina
Everything is in Durham and North Carolina.
This formula has no matching transcription.
possibleAnswers: Anything that is in Durham is in North Carolina
Everything is in Durham and North Carolina.
